source/include/boost/type_traits/is_class.hpp

00009 
00010 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_CLASS_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 #define BOOST_TT_IS_CLASS_HPP_INCLUDED
00012 
00013 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00014 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_union.hpp"
00015 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_and.hpp"
00016 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_not.hpp"
00017 
00018 #ifdef BOOST_TT_HAS_CONFORMING_IS_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION
00019 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/yes_no_type.hpp"
00020 #else
00021 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_scalar.hpp"
00022 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_array.hpp"
00023 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp"
00024 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_void.hpp"
00025 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_function.hpp"
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 #ifdef __EDG_VERSION__
00029 #   include "boost/type_traits/remove_cv.hpp"
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 // should be the last #include
00033 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00034 
00035 namespace boost {
00036 
00037 namespace detail {
00038 
00039 #ifdef BOOST_TT_HAS_CONFORMING_IS_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION
00040 
00041 // This is actually the conforming implementation which works with
00042 // abstract classes.  However, enough compilers have trouble with
00043 // it that most will use the one in
00044 // boost/type_traits/object_traits.hpp. This implementation
00045 // actually works with VC7.0, but other interactions seem to fail
00046 // when we use it.
00047 
00048 // is_class<> metafunction due to Paul Mensonides
00049 // (leavings@attbi.com). For more details:
00050 // http://groups.google.com/groups?hl=en&selm=000001c1cc83%24e154d5e0%247772e50c%40c161550a&rnum=1
00051 #if defined(__GNUC__)  && !defined(__EDG_VERSION__)
00052 
00053 template <class U> ::boost::type_traits::yes_type is_class_tester(void(U::*)(void));
00054 template <class U> ::boost::type_traits::no_type is_class_tester(...);
00055 
00056 template <typename T>
00057 struct is_class_impl
00058 {
00059 
00060     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00061         (::boost::type_traits::ice_and<
00062             sizeof(is_class_tester<T>(0)) == sizeof(::boost::type_traits::yes_type),
00063             ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_union<T>::value >::value
00064         >::value)
00065         );
00066 };
00067 
00068 #else
00069 
00070 template <typename T>
00071 struct is_class_impl
00072 {
00073     template <class U> static ::boost::type_traits::yes_type is_class_tester(void(U::*)(void));
00074     template <class U> static ::boost::type_traits::no_type is_class_tester(...);
00075 
00076     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00077         (::boost::type_traits::ice_and<
00078             sizeof(is_class_tester<T>(0)) == sizeof(::boost::type_traits::yes_type),
00079             ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_union<T>::value >::value
00080         >::value)
00081         );
00082 };
00083 
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #else
00087 
00088 template <typename T>
00089 struct is_class_impl
00090 {
00091 #   ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00092     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00093     (::boost::type_traits::ice_and<
00094         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_union<T>::value >::value,
00095         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_scalar<T>::value >::value,
00096         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_array<T>::value >::value,
00097         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_reference<T>::value>::value,
00098         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_void<T>::value >::value,
00099         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_function<T>::value >::value
00100         >::value));
00101 #   else
00102     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00103     (::boost::type_traits::ice_and<
00104         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_union<T>::value >::value,
00105         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_scalar<T>::value >::value,
00106         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_array<T>::value >::value,
00107         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_reference<T>::value>::value,
00108         ::boost::type_traits::ice_not< ::boost::is_void<T>::value >::value
00109         >::value));
00110 #   endif
00111 };
00112 
00113 # endif // BOOST_TT_HAS_CONFORMING_IS_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION
00114 
00115 } // namespace detail
00116 
00117 # ifdef __EDG_VERSION__
00118 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(
00119     is_class,T, detail::is_class_impl<typename remove_cv<T>::type>::value)
00120 # else 
00121 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_class,T,::boost::detail::is_class_impl<T>::value)
00122 # endif
00123     
00124 } // namespace boost
00125 
00126 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"
00127 
00128 #endif // BOOST_TT_IS_CLASS_HPP_INCLUDED
